values.name: auto
values.prose: Declares that the element is potentially eligible to participate in the anchor node selection algorithm for any scrolling box created by the element or an ancestor.

values.name: none
values.prose: Declares that the element and its descendants (that arenâ€™t nested inside of another scrolling element) are not eligible to participate in the anchor node selection algorithm for any scrolling box created by the element or an ancestor.
